title: who makes the decisions as to which streets or roads are re-paved in the county. Also, where would one get a copy of the planned improvements for 2010.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1770 The N.C. DOT's statewide Transportation Improvement Plan, which lists road projects, is available here: http://www.ncdot.gov/projects/
